Set the min contig size to 0 in QUAST to fix inaccurate N50 values

The total number of contigs fetched from QUAST is also forced to be the
number of contigs above 0bp as well.

Removed MDMcleaner steps (fixes #4)

MDMcleaner is not suitable in the case of isolate genomes and could
rather be used as a standalone tool to carefully evaluate the contigs
and the database instead of throwing away the baby with the bath water.
Especially in the case of novel taxa
Update the changelog

Alternative option for MDMcleaner in case of fail

The default workflow of MDMCleaner raised sometimes exceptions when
checking reference database ambiguity.
The focus here is the identification of contaminated contigs more than
database integrity, therefore the `--fast_run` flag can be used if the
default workflow failed.

The source for the flexible rule is: https://stackoverflow.com/a/73403710

Debug plasmids_when_needed() to not trigger uneeeded rules

* Need to check first the plasmid reconstruction step in order *before* the plasmid extraction in order to not trigger the plasmid workflow if the extraction was not run.
* It is related to b19bd67aa124a29f24138fa75b0deeb7029baa62
